purpose: Empower Laravel developers to easily integrate and manage AI agents within their applications
principle: Builds on Laravel's service container and middleware to provide a flexible and extendable AI agent integration framework
reusability: Designed as a Laravel package, it can be easily integrated into existing Laravel applications with support for custom agent configurations
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited documentation and feature set; primarily targets Laravel-based projects
name: LarAgent
description: Power of AI Agents in your Laravel project
highlight: Seamlessly integrates AI agents into Laravel projects, enhancing application capabilities with minimal setup
